name: Monster Mash (itch) (Tidohuki)
description:
A CONTROLLER IS NECCESSARY FOR THIS GAME TO WORK

Ah!! Here* there be Gerblins! Don’t let them out unless you want a mess on your hands
*inside your controller

The Gerblins inside your controller are up to their classic antics and are making a break for it!
Press the button they’re attacking, but overuse will damage your buttons!
Don’t let them get out of control!

Controls

  • Press the button as they appear underneath
  • Don't mash your buttons when there's no Gerblin underneath, otherwise you'll damage your buttons
  • It's whack-a-mole with your controller

Animation & Programming: @Tidohuki
Additional Art: @wiltless

Ran out of time for audio, whoops!
